title: Charley Squash goes to town
brief_description: An animated film, based on an Indian comic-strip character created by Duke Redbird, telling the story of a young Indian who leaves the reserve to make his way in the city. Eventually he returns to the reserve and the ways of his people. Animation: Yvon Mallette, Marie Claire Berube. Voice and narration: Isaac Beaulieu. (Award: Philadelphia)
